scheduled_task_template:
`{task_id}` - Scheduled task with **{task_delay} seconds** delay.
- Execution: <t:{task_first_execution_timestamp}:R>
scheduled_at_fixed_rate_task_template:
`{task_id}` - Task scheduled at fixed rate with **{task_delay} seconds** delay and **{task_period} seconds** period.
- First execution: <t:{task_first_execution_timestamp}:R>
- Last execution: <t:{task_most_recent_execution_timestamp}:R>
- Next execution: <t:{task_next_execution_timestamp}:R>
